title: Drawing, "Antique Statue of a Priestess", ca. 1820
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and sepia wash on off white laid paper
markings: Watermark: part of lily in double segment
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Figure shown walking toward right while holding something in his left hand.

Drawing, "Antique Statue of a Priestess", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Pen and brown ink, brush and sepia wash on off white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1045.
